bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for the Evaluation of the Remaining Life of Impregnated Paper-Insulated Transmission Cable Systems
IEEE Guide for the Evaluation of the Remaining Life of Impregnated Paper-Insulated Transmission Cable Systems

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Reaffirmed September 2007. This guide provides technical information regarding factors that can affect the life of an impregnated paper-insulated transmission cable system, and it reviews available methods to evaluate the remaining life of such systems and preventive maintenance to extend their service life

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
